meta.website.title.default: Startup investing made simple, for everyone

KYC.Index.chooseType.title: What type of investor are you?
KYC.Index.chooseType.individual: Use an individual account if you want to invest on your own behalf.
KYC.Index.chooseType.institution: Use a professional account if you will invest on behalf of an accredited organization.
KYC.Index.requiredData.title: Required Data
KYC.Index.requiredData.description: In order to complete the verification process, you will need to provide:
KYC.Index.requiredData.individual.proofO: proof of address (utility bill or bank statement)
KYC.Index.requiredData.individual.source: a declaration of source of funds
KYC.Index.requiredData.support: If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team.
KYC.Success.title: Success!
KYC.Success.subtitle: We’re Verifying Your Identity
KYC.Success.message: This will take from 1 to 3 business days. Once we have verified your details, you will receive a confirmation via email. Meanwhile, be sure to read more about Jibrel’s current investment opportunities.
KYC.Company.beneficiary.form.title: Beneficiary
